info.title: CLEAN Data API
info.description:
API for accessing enzyme kinetic data from the CLEAN database

## Automatic Pagination

When a query would return more than 5000 records and no explicit limit is
provided, the API will automatically paginate results to return 5000 records
at a time. The response will include pagination metadata with links to navigate
to next and previous pages.

This threshold can be configured using the AUTO_PAGINATION_THRESHOLD environment variable.

get.description: Get enzyme kinetic data with filtering options.

predictions_uniprot_annot_id.title: Predictions Uniprot Annot Id
predictions_uniprot_annot_id.description: Unique identifier for the CLEAN predictions record.

uniprot.title: Uniprot
uniprot.description: Unique identifier for the Uniprot record.

curation_status.title: Curation Status
curation_status.description: Status of the curation for the Uniprot record.

protein.title: Protein
protein.description: Name of the protein associated with the Uniprot record.

organism.title: Organism
organism.description: Name of the organism associated with the Uniprot record.

ncbi_tax_id.title: Ncbi Tax Id
ncbi_tax_id.description: NCBI Taxonomy ID for the organism associated with the Uniprot record.

amino_acids.title: Amino Acids
amino_acids.description: Length of the amino acid sequence associated with the Uniprot record.

sequence.title: Sequence
sequence.description: Amino acid sequence of the protein associated with the Uniprot record.

function.title: Function
function.description: Function of the enzyme associated with the Uniprot record.

gene_name.title: Gene Name
gene_name.description: Name of the gene associated with the Uniprot record.

predicted_ec.title: Predicted Ec
predicted_ec.description: List of CLEAN predicted EC numbers with associated confidence scores.

annot_ec_number_array.title: Annot Ec Number Array
annot_ec_number_array.description: List of annotated EC numbers associated with the Uniprot record. Each EC number is a string.

CLEANECLookupMatch.title: CLEANECLookupMatch
CLEANECLookupMatch.description: Model for a single match in the CLEAN EC lookup response.

search.title: Search
search.description: The search term used for the lookup.

matches.title: Matches
matches.description: List of matches for the EC lookup.

total.title: Total
total.description: Total number of records matching the query.

next.title: Next
next.description: Link to the next page of results.

previous.title: Previous
previous.description: Link to the previous page of results.

data.title: Data
data.description: List of records matching the query.

CLEANSearchResponse.title: CLEANSearchResponse
CLEANSearchResponse.description: Model for the response of a CLEAN search query.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search term for typeahead suggestions (minimum 3 characters)

matches.title: Matches
matches.description: List of results matching the search term.

CLEANTypeaheadResponse.title: CLEANTypeaheadResponse
CLEANTypeaheadResponse.description: Model for the response of a CLEAN typeahead query.
